cause.description:
My name is Julie Olson. My friend Sarah Gale asked me to come on board with her to start a fund raiser for Invisible Children; I accepted, and now we are heading full tilt into this project; it's going great so far! Our goal is to raise $40,000 in one year to send to Northern Uganda. We have a variety of events planned for the year to come, and we need people with time to volunteer, the ability to spread the word, and/or money to donate. Discover the unseen; Think Globally, Act Locally.
1. Freedom and Peace
2. Proper Health Care and Education
cause.mission: Our mission is to raise money and awareness to aid the war-affected children of Northern Uganda.
cause.name: SJVISION - Invisible Children
